# **STATISTICIAN R COURSES**

## **FOUNDATIONAL STATISTICS**

**Statistician**

-   **Function:** Professional role combining statistical theory, R programming, and data analysis expertise for research and business insights
-   **Website:** [https://www.amstat.org](https://www.amstat.org){target="_blank"}
-   **Cost Model:** Career Path

**Introduction to Statistics in R**

-   **Function:** Comprehensive introduction to statistical concepts and R programming fundamentals for data analysis and visualization
-   **Website:** <https://www.datacamp.com>
-   **Cost Model:** Subscription

**Foundations of Probability in R**

-   **Function:** Core probability theory, distributions, and random variables using R for statistical modeling and inference
-   **Website:** <https://www.datacamp.com>
-   **Cost Model:** Subscription

**Foundations of Inference in R**

-   **Function:** Statistical inference principles including confidence intervals, hypothesis testing, and p-values using R programming
-   **Website:** <https://www.datacamp.com>
-   **Cost Model:** Subscription

## **REGRESSION & MODELING**

**Introduction to Regression in R**

-   **Function:** Linear regression fundamentals, model building, diagnostics, and interpretation using R statistical packages
-   **Website:** <https://www.datacamp.com>
-   **Cost Model:** Subscription

**Intermediate Regression in R**

-   **Function:** Advanced regression techniques including multiple regression, polynomial regression, and model selection strategies
-   **Website:** <https://www.datacamp.com>
-   **Cost Model:** Subscription

**Hierarchical and Mixed Effects Models in R**

-   **Function:** Multi-level modeling, random effects, and nested data analysis using lme4 and similar R packages
-   **Website:** <https://www.datacamp.com>
-   **Cost Model:** Subscription

## **SPECIALIZED ANALYSIS METHODS**

**Sampling in R**

-   **Function:** Sampling theory, survey design, and sampling distributions with practical R implementations for data collection
-   **Website:** <https://www.datacamp.com>
-   **Cost Model:** Subscription

**Hypothesis Testing in R**

-   **Function:** Statistical hypothesis testing, t-tests, ANOVA, chi-square tests, and non-parametric methods using R
-   **Website:** <https://www.datacamp.com>
-   **Cost Model:** Subscription

**Experimental Design in R**

-   **Function:** Design of experiments, randomization, blocking, factorial designs, and analysis using R statistical tools
-   **Website:** <https://www.datacamp.com>
-   **Cost Model:** Subscription

**Analyzing Survey Data in R**

-   **Function:** Survey data analysis techniques, weighting, complex sampling designs, and survey package utilization in R
-   **Website:** <https://www.datacamp.com>
-   **Cost Model:** Subscription

## **ADVANCED STATISTICAL METHODS**

**Survival Analysis in R**

-   **Function:** Time-to-event analysis, Kaplan-Meier curves, Cox regression, and survival modeling using R survival packages
-   **Website:** <https://www.datacamp.com>
-   **Cost Model:** Subscription

**Fundamentals of Bayesian Data Analysis in R**

-   **Function:** Bayesian inference, MCMC methods, prior distributions, and posterior analysis using R and Stan/JAGS
-   **Website:** <https://www.datacamp.com>
-   **Cost Model:** Subscription

**Factor Analysis in R**

-   **Function:** Exploratory and confirmatory factor analysis, dimensionality reduction, and latent variable modeling in R
-   **Website:** <https://www.datacamp.com>
-   **Cost Model:** Subscription
